articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Tech stocks in Hong Kong surge in shortened trading day for multiple Asia-Pacific markets - CNBC
articles.description: Markets in Japan and South Korea were closed on Friday, while others such as Hong Kong and Singapore ended early on the final trading day of 2021.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Hong Kong stocks led gains among major Asia-Pacific markets on Friday, with Chinese tech stocks in the city soaring.
Markets in Australia, Hong Kong and Singapore closed early on Friday fo… [+2169 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: More return trays at hawker centres; table littering rules start on Jan 1 at foodcourts, coffee shops - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): More than four in five diners at hawker centres in Singapore are now returning their used crockery on trays, a marked improvement from before strict table littering rules took effect in September this year.
articles.content: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): More than four in five diners at hawker centres in Singapore are now returning their used crockery on trays, a marked improvement from before strict t… [+2642 chars]

articles.title: Chinese netizens scold Bobby Au-yeung for celebrating Christmas because the holiday is 'only for foreigners' - AsiaOne
articles.description: Who knew donning a Santa hat and having your own Christmas tree would incite backlash online? Hong Kong actor Bobby Au-yeung certainly didn't. Last Friday (Dec 24), the 61-year old uploaded two videos onto Douyin, TikTok's sister app in China, in celebration …
articles.content:
Who knew donning a Santa hat and having your own Christmas tree would incite backlash online? Hong Kong actor Bobby Au-yeung certainly didn't.
